import Counter from './counter' import { ethers } from 'ethers' import abi from 'erc-20-abi' import { useEffect, useState } from 'react' export default function Vault() { const [balance, setBalance] = useState(null) useEffect(() => { const provider = new ethers.providers.Web3Provider(window.ethereum) console.log(provider) const address = '0x25f8087ead173b73d6e8b84329989a8eea16cf73' const erc20_rw = new ethers.Contract(address, abi, provider) async function getBalance() { console.log(await erc20_rw.balanceOf(address)) } getBalance() }, []) return (

Yield Guild Prize Pool

available: {balance}

YGG

max

) }
